words.sentence: I usually have an apple for a healthy snack in the afternoon.
englishMeanings: A round fruit with red, green, or yellow skin and crisp flesh

words.sentence: I'm currently reading a book about the history of ancient civilizations.
englishMeanings: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers

words.sentence: We decided to rent a car for our weekend trip to the countryside.
englishMeanings: A road vehicle, typically with four wheels, powered by an internal combustion engine or electric motor and able to carry a small number of people

words.sentence: My neighbor's dog always barks when someone walks past their house.
englishMeanings: A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, nonretractable claws, and a barking, howling, or whining voice

words.sentence: We're planning to repaint our house next month to give it a fresh look.
englishMeanings: A building for human habitation, especially one that consists of a ground floor and one or more upper storeys

words.sentence: Remember to wear sunscreen when you're out in the sun for a long time.
englishMeanings: The star around which the earth orbits

words.sentence: It's important to drink plenty of water, especially during hot weather.
englishMeanings: A colorless, transparent, odorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain and is the basis of the fluids of living organisms

words.sentence: The old oak tree in our backyard provides shade on hot summer days.
englishMeanings: A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height and bearing lateral branches at some distance from the ground

words.sentence: I'm meeting an old friend for coffee later; we haven't seen each other in years.
englishMeanings: A person with whom one has a bond of mutual affection, typically one exclusive of sexual or family relations

words.sentence: The new school year starts next week, and I'm excited to see my classmates again.
englishMeanings: An institution for educating children

words.sentence: I love trying different types of food from around the world.
englishMeanings: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink or that plants absorb in order to maintain life and growth

words.sentence: She received a beautiful bouquet of flowers for her birthday.
englishMeanings: The seed-bearing part of a plant, consisting of reproductive organs surrounded by brightly colored petals

words.sentence: I need to charge my phone before we leave; the battery is almost dead.
englishMeanings: A device used to transmit sound over long distances, especially a mobile phone

words.sentence: Living in a big city can be exciting, but it's also quite expensive.
englishMeanings: A large town, typically with a population of at least 100,000 people

words.sentence: We often see colorful birds in our garden, especially in the spring.
englishMeanings: A warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrate animal distinguished by the possession of feathers, wings, a beak, and typically by being able to fly

words.sentence: I never seem to have enough time to finish all my tasks during the workweek.
englishMeanings: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future regarded as a whole

words.sentence: We're having a big family reunion next month to celebrate my grandparents' anniversary.
englishMeanings: A group consisting of parents and children living together in a household

words.sentence: I enjoy listening to different genres of music, but classical is my favorite.
englishMeanings: Vocal or instrumental sounds combined in such a way as to produce beauty of form, harmony, and expression of emotion

words.sentence: I need to upgrade my computer because it's getting too slow for my work.
englishMeanings: An electronic device for storing and processing data, typically in binary form, according to instructions given to it in a variable program

words.sentence: They say that love can overcome any obstacle, but relationships still require effort.
englishMeanings: An intense feeling of deep affection

words.sentence: We gathered around the table for a family dinner.
englishMeanings: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface on which objects may be placed

words.sentence: The air feels fresh after the rain.
englishMeanings: The invisible gaseous substance surrounding the earth, a mixture mainly of oxygen and nitrogen

words.sentence: The full moon lit up the night sky beautifully.
englishMeanings: The natural satellite of the earth, visible (chiefly at night) by reflected light from the sun

words.sentence: We went kayaking on the river last weekend.
englishMeanings: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another such stream

words.sentence: The view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
englishMeanings: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level

words.sentence: I need to buy some paper for the printer.
englishMeanings: Material manufactured in thin sheets from the pulp of wood or other fibrous substances, used for writing, drawing, or printing on

words.sentence: It's important to save money for the future.
englishMeanings: A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes

words.sentence: Please close the door when you leave.
englishMeanings: A hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle

words.sentence: Open the window to let some fresh air in.
englishMeanings: An opening in the wall or roof of a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material in a frame to admit light or air and allow people to see out

words.sentence: This chair is very comfortable to sit in.
englishMeanings: A separate seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs

words.sentence: Our house is on a quiet street in the suburbs.
englishMeanings: A public road in a city or town, typically with houses and buildings on one or both sides

words.sentence: She waved her hand to say goodbye.
englishMeanings: The end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist, including the palm, fingers, and thumb
A pointer on a clock or watch indicating the passing of units of time

words.sentence: He has bright blue eyes like his mother.
englishMeanings: Each of a pair of globular organs of sight in the head of humans and vertebrate animals

words.sentence: Exercise is good for your heart health.
englishMeanings: A hollow muscular organ that pumps the blood through the circulatory system

words.sentence: We spent the day relaxing by the sea.
englishMeanings: The expanse of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface

words.sentence: The stars shine brightly in the night sky.
englishMeanings: The period of darkness in each twenty-four hours; the time from sunset to sunrise

words.sentence: It's been a long day at work.
englishMeanings: A period of twenty-four hours as a unit of time

words.sentence: I'm going on vacation for a week next month.
englishMeanings: A period of seven days

words.sentence: This year has been full of unexpected events.
englishMeanings: The time taken by the earth to make one revolution around the sun

words.sentence: My mother always gives the best advice.
englishMeanings: A woman in relation to her child or children

words.sentence: My father taught me how to ride a bike.
englishMeanings: A man in relation to his child or children

words.sentence: My younger brother is starting college this fall.
englishMeanings: A man or boy in relation to other sons and daughters of his parents

words.sentence: I helped my sister with her homework last night.
englishMeanings: A woman or girl in relation to other daughters and sons of her parents

words.sentence: Our new English teacher is very enthusiastic about literature.
englishMeanings: A person who teaches, especially in a school

words.sentence: As a student, it's important to manage your time effectively.
englishMeanings: A person who is studying at a school or college

words.sentence: I have an appointment with the doctor next week for a check-up.
englishMeanings: A qualified practitioner of medicine; a physician

words.sentence: The nurse took my blood pressure and temperature.
englishMeanings: A person trained to care for the sick or infirm, especially in a hospital

words.sentence: A good friend is always there for you in times of need.
englishMeanings: A person with whom one has a bond of mutual affection, typically one exclusive of sexual or family relations

words.sentence: Our new neighbors invited us over for dinner last night.
englishMeanings: A person living next door to or very near to another

words.sentence: Every child deserves a good education and a loving home.
englishMeanings: A young human being below the age of puberty or below the legal age of majority

words.sentence: With hard work, you can accomplish your goals.
englishMeanings: To succeed in doing or completing something

words.sentence: Can you recommend a good restaurant in this area?
englishMeanings: To suggest that someone or something would be good or suitable for a particular job or purpose

words.sentence: Regular exercise can improve your overall health.
englishMeanings: To make or become better

words.sentence: We need to consider all options before making a decision.
englishMeanings: To think carefully about something, typically before making a decision

words.sentence: It's important to maintain a healthy diet and exercise routine.
englishMeanings: To keep in existence or continuance; preserve

words.sentence: With dedication, you can achieve great things in life.
englishMeanings: To successfully bring about or reach (a desired objective or result) by effort, skill, or courage

words.sentence: We need to reduce our energy consumption to help the environment.
englishMeanings: To make smaller or less in amount, degree, or size

words.sentence: The project will involve several departments working together.
englishMeanings: To include or contain as a necessary part or result

words.sentence: The company plans to expand its operations to other countries.
englishMeanings: To become or make larger or more extensive

words.sentence: Everyone should contribute to keeping the environment clean.
englishMeanings: To give or add something to help a cause or provide support

words.sentence: The new system works effectively to reduce waiting times.
englishMeanings: In a way that produces the intended result

words.sentence: The temperature gradually increased throughout the day.
englishMeanings: In a gradual way; slowly and steadily

words.sentence: We occasionally go out for dinner on weekends.
englishMeanings: At infrequent or irregular intervals; now and then

words.sentence: The test was relatively easy compared to last year's exam.
englishMeanings: In relation or comparison to something else

words.sentence: I'm particularly interested in ancient history.
englishMeanings: To a higher degree than is usual or average; especially

words.sentence: The journey takes approximately two hours by car.
englishMeanings: Used to show that something is almost, but not completely, accurate or exact

words.sentence: The two proposals are essentially the same.
englishMeanings: In the most important respects; fundamentally

words.sentence: A high price doesn't necessarily mean high quality.
englishMeanings: As a necessary result; inevitably

words.sentence: The website is primarily designed for educational purposes.
englishMeanings: For the most part; mainly

words.sentence: Regular exercise can significantly improve your health.
englishMeanings: In a sufficiently great or important way as to be worthy of attention

words.sentence: Communication is crucial for the success of any team project.
englishMeanings: Decisive or critical, especially in the success or failure of something

words.sentence: Experience is a valuable asset in many job markets.
englishMeanings: Worth a great deal of money
Extremely useful or important

words.sentence: Climate change is a global issue that affects everyone.
englishMeanings: Relating to the whole world; worldwide

words.sentence: Our company values having a diverse workforce.
englishMeanings: Showing a great deal of variety; very different

words.sentence: The company is known for its innovative approach to problem-solving.
englishMeanings: Featuring new methods; advanced and original

words.sentence: We need to find more sustainable ways of producing energy.
englishMeanings: Able to be maintained at a certain rate or level
Causing little or no damage to the environment and therefore able to continue for a long time

words.sentence: The new production line is much more efficient than the old one.
englishMeanings: Achieving maximum productivity with minimum wasted effort or expense

words.sentence: Having flexible working hours can improve work-life balance.
englishMeanings: Able to be easily modified to respond to altered circumstances or conditions

words.sentence: The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the current market trends.
englishMeanings: Including or dealing with all or nearly all elements or aspects of something

words.sentence: Water is essential for all forms of life.
englishMeanings: Absolutely necessary; extremely important
